ygData.subject: My Main concern
ygData.msgSnippet: I think it is fantastic that at high lvl (39+) 3 dots, heart flutter engulfing darkness and Heat blood, stack up for 410 dmg. Not too bad at all. The main
ygData.messageBody:
I think it is fantastic that at high lvl (39+) 3 dots, heart flutter
engulfing darkness and Heat blood, stack up for 410 dmg. Not too bad at all.
The main problem is with engulfing darkness. I may as well not have it
memorised since it is overriden but root ( all casters and paladins) snare
(rangers and druids), ensnare ( those stupid ranger swords) and engulfing
darkness itself (a rogues SBD). so when I eliminate all the classes that
would interfere with one of my main spells, I am left to solo. God only
knows why snare, a lvl 1 spell, overrides one of my main lvl 22 spells. It's
also a Necro lvl 8 or 12 spell I think.
Something has to be done to make this more effective again.
- We can make it override the other spells, and let them get the crappy does
not hold message. I kinda like that one 8) given ther relative few SK's
around this wouldn't happen to often, but no doubt the druid would start
whining about nerfing again.
- We can change the whole line to some other line of spells. I don't like
this since I think many SK's love their darkness spells due to their dual
purpose (dmg and slowing)
- We can make it stack with the other spells such as snare and root. I don;t
mind this one either but I can't see this one being impolemented.

What are everyone else's thought on this problem?

Inosolan Braveheart
Human SK 43
Veeshan
